item.title: The Power of Speaking the Truth
item.description: Speaker: Luvvie Ajayi Jones Luvvie describes herself as a professional troublemaker. Her purpose is to critique the world and challenge people and systems to do better. On Fear Luvvie wanted to be a doctor but struggled with chemistry in college. This led her to start blogging in 2003 instead.
